YouTube Downloader.changelog:
• Major update since the deprecated v1.20 release.
• Complete UI redesign with a more modern and clean look.
• Added new features and improved existing ones.
• Fixed Picture-in-Picture (PiP) button issues.
• Improved compatibility with newer Android versions.
• Multiple bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Overall stability and user experience improvements.

DasMediaHub.changelog:
• Minor UI refinements and visual improvements.
• Fixed Picture-in-Picture (PiP) button issues.
• Bug fixes and performance optimizations.
• Improved stability on newer Android versions.
• General improvements and polishing.
